lead_paragraph: Antrel Rolle will have to be a leader in the Giants secondary in his first year with the team as safety Kenny Phillips recovers from knee surgery.
snippet: Antrel Rolle will have to be a leader in the Giants secondary in his first year with the team as safety Kenny Phillips recovers from knee surgery.

headline.main: Known for Making Locker Room Listen, Rolle Has a New Team to Lead
headline.seo: Giants Need Rolle to Be a Leader as Phillips Recovers
headline.print_headline: Known for Making Locker Room Listen, Rolle Has a New Team to Lead
